SELECT U.MOBILE, A.CUST_ID, A.ACCT_ID, C.CUST_NAME ACCT_NAME, A.BALANCE, A.FREEZE_AMT, A.ONWAY_AMT, A.USABLE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(A.INST_DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as instDatetime FROM TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U JOIN STCS.ACCT_SEVEN_CUST A ON U.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID JOIN TD_CUST_INFO C ON U.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID
AND C.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{acctName},'%')
AND U.MOBILE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%')
ORDER BY A.USABLE_AMT DESC

SELECT SUM(A.BALANCE) BALANCE_COUNT, SUM(A.USABLE_AMT) USABLE_AMT_COUNT, SUM(A.FREEZE_AMT) FREEZE_AMT_COUNT, SUM(A.ONWAY_AMT) ONWAY_AMT_COUNT FROM TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U JOIN STCS.ACCT_SEVEN_CUST A ON U.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID
